version_description:
- Для работы в демо-режиме теперь необходимо использовать логин и пароль от учебного счета Transaq
- Добавлена возможность просмотра нереализованной и дневной прибыли для открытых позиций в портфеле

- Для работы в демо-режиме теперь необходимо использовать логин и пароль от учебного счета Transaq
- Добавлена возможность просмотра нереализованной и дневной прибыли для открытых позиций в портфеле

- Добавлен текущий bid и ask на экран подтверждения новой заявки
- В форме заявки улучшено отображение типа будущей операции (покупка или продажа)
- Исправление ошибок и другие улучшения

- Добавлен текущий bid и ask на экран подтверждения новой заявки
- В форме заявки улучшено отображение типа будущей операции (покупка или продажа)
- Исправление ошибок и другие улучшения

- Поддержка iPhone X
- Исправление ошибок и другие улучшения

- Поддержка iPhone X
- Исправление ошибок и другие улучшения

- Some frequently used application screens was updated.
- A new section "Contacts" will allow you to find our office in your city, as well as send us your wishes and comments.
- Brokerage notifications will allow you to receive important personal messages - notifications related to the client, account, conditions of service and other.
- Individual investment accounts are highlighted. Now it's easier to determine the required account.
- Added the ability to choose how to display quotes - by name or ticker.
- Bug fixes and many other improvements.

- Some frequently used application screens was updated.
- A new section "Contacts" will allow you to find our office in your city, as well as send us your wishes and comments.
- Brokerage notifications will allow you to receive important personal messages - notifications related to the client, account, conditions of service and other.
- Individual investment accounts are highlighted. Now it's easier to determine the required account.
- Added the ability to choose how to display quotes - by name or ticker.
- Bug fixes and many other improvements.

- Alerts have been added to receive notifications about the occurrence of the events you specified
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Alerts have been added to receive notifications about the occurrence of the events you specified
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Updated charts - now under the hood more power and speed. To do this, we performed a deep optimization and got rid of many old problems.
- Added graphical analysis tools. Now there is everything you need to make the right decisions.
- Added FINAM stickers for iMessage.
- General optimization, bug fixes and improvements.

- Updated charts - now under the hood more power and speed. To do this, we performed a deep optimization and got rid of many old problems.
- Added graphical analysis tools. Now there is everything you need to make the right decisions.
- Added FINAM stickers for iMessage.
- General optimization, bug fixes and improvements.
- Fixed a problem with displaying charts if the device uses the Display Zoom function
- Fixed a problem with displaying charts if the device uses the Display Zoom function

- Updated design of quotes and accounts widgets
- Significantly improved the work of Apple Watch app and widgets
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Updated design of quotes and accounts widgets
- Significantly improved the work of Apple Watch app and widgets
- Other improvements and bug fixes

- Favorites lists switch moved from the menu to the "Favorites" screen
- Added menu section "About", auxiliary functions have been transferred to it
- Gainers/Losers moved from the menu to the Today screen
- Bug fixes and other improvements

- Favorites lists switch moved from the menu to the "Favorites" screen
- Added menu section "About", auxiliary functions have been transferred to it
- Gainers/Losers moved from the menu to the Today screen
- Bug fixes and other improvements

- Added stop-orders (Stop-Loss, Take-Profit)
- The set of conditions types for trading orders has been expanded
- Updated portfolio view: positions, orders and deals contain more information
- Expanded portfolio settings: short and detailed mode, sorting options, the ability to hide zero positions and other display options
- Updated detailed information screen for orders and deals
- Other fixes and improvements

- Added stop-orders (Stop-Loss, Take-Profit)
- The set of conditions types for trading orders has been expanded
- Updated portfolio view: positions, orders and deals contain more information
- Expanded portfolio settings: short and detailed mode, sorting options, the ability to hide zero positions and other display options
- Updated detailed information screen for orders and deals
- Other fixes and improvements

- Added stop-orders (Stop-Loss, Take-Profit)
- The set of conditions types for trading orders has been expanded
- Updated portfolio view: positions, orders and deals contain more information
- Expanded portfolio settings: short and detailed mode, sorting options, the ability to hide zero positions and other display options
- Updated detailed information screen for orders and deals
- Other fixes and improvements

- Added stop-orders (Stop-Loss, Take-Profit)
- The set of conditions types for trading orders has been expanded
- Updated portfolio view: positions, orders and deals contain more information
- Expanded portfolio settings: short and detailed mode, sorting options, the ability to hide zero positions and other display options
- Updated detailed information screen for orders and deals
- Other fixes and improvements

- Fixed bug affected displaying orders on the chart
- Other fixes and improvements

- Fixed bug affected displaying orders on the chart
- Other fixes and improvements
We carefully studied user reviews and took part of the wishes into this update. In the next releases you will find a new portion of bug fixes and improvements.
We carefully studied user reviews and took part of the wishes into this update. In the next releases you will find a new portion of bug fixes and improvements.
- Fixed a bug caused to the app crashing when opening the chart
- Fixed a bug caused to the app crashing when opening the chart

- Push notifications for trade order status changes. You will be notified when the order is activated, executed, rejected or otherwise changes its status. You can manage this notifications in portfolio settings.
- Bug fixes and other improvements.

- Push notifications for trade order status changes. You will be notified when the order is activated, executed, rejected or otherwise changes its status. You can manage this notifications in portfolio settings.
- Bug fixes and other improvements.

- The activation condition types for the trade order have been changed: redundant types have been removed and the activation condition at the specified time has been added
- Fixed display of market data, portfolio structure, bugs in charts and orders

- The activation condition types for the trade order have been changed: redundant types have been removed and the activation condition at the specified time has been added
- Fixed display of market data, portfolio structure, bugs in charts and orders
